pr_title: GEODE-8662: add integration tests for strlen

timeline.message: add unit tests for string methods
fix error messages to match redis

timeline.bodyText: Could we change this back to the ERROR_NOT_INTEGER constant? Geode Redis should return the same errors as Redis.
timeline.author: sabbey37

replies.bodyText: If our messages are out of sync with native redis shouldn't we be seeing our native acceptance tests failing on this branch? It looks like they all passed. Does this indicate something is wrong with our native redis testing?
replies.author: dschneider-pivotal

replies.bodyText: This one was not out of sync until this PR.  The reason it still passes is because it was changed to only check that the error message contains "out of range" rather than the full message "value is not an integer or out of range".  I'm sure there are some messages throughout our code that are not the same as Redis, but we haven't found them yet because the commands are not fully tested.
replies.author: sabbey37

timeline.bodyText: I definitely understand your thinking here.  However, we want to match the errors returned by Redis, which is why we are returning the not integer error.  We had to use a Java long here instead of an integer because the integer's storage capacity was not large enough, according to the Redis INCR docs the string stored at the key is interpreted as a base-10 64 bit signed integer.
timeline.author: sabbey37

timeline.bodyText: I don't think Redis ever returns this error.
timeline.author: sabbey37

timeline.bodyText: This seems to be an error due to the inability to parse the value as a long rather than due to overflow.  We could change the test name or make it error due to overflow instead.
timeline.author: sabbey37

timeline.bodyText: This also seems to be an error due to the inability to parse the value as a long rather than due to overflow. We could change the test name or make it error due to overflow instead.
timeline.author: sabbey37

timeline.message: Adds more precise error message verification to incr integration test
